task.title: Override with new CSS
task.shortdesc: It is possible to override Reveal.js defaults with new CSS code.

step.cmd: Create an id tag by adding the pound symbol before a name.
Add CSS code for the desired effect to this id tag.
step.stepxmp: For example, to center the text, {text-align: center}

step.cmd: In your HTML file, create a div with this id

result.p: Every div in the HTML file with this id will be centered.
